name: mikroe.click.usbuartiso
short_description: USB UART ISO Click is a compact add-on board that offers a completely isolated differential pair of lines of the USB physical interface. This board features the ISOUSB111, a full/low-speed isolated USB repeater from Texas Instruments. It is a USB 2.0-compliant device that supports low-speed (1.5Mbps) and full-speed (12Mbps) signaling, USB On-The-Go (OtG), and Type-C Dual Role Port (DRP). In addition, this Click boardâ„¢ comes with the FT232R, a USB UART IC from FTDI, making it a complete USB-to-UART isolated solution.
